Detailed Description

This class defines an emerge package.

Author:
Alessandro Diaferia

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Package::Attribute

The package attribute as emerge reports them in the form: [ebuild NR...]

Enumerator:
New  The package is new and not already installed.
Slotted  The package is slotted.
Updating  The package will be updated.
Downgrading  The package is will be downgraded.
Reinstalling  The package will be reinstalled.
FetchRestrictionManualDownload  The fetch of the package is restricted, the user has to manually download it.
FetchRestrictionAlreadyDownloaded  The fetch is restricted but the package already downloaded.
Interactive  The package requires user input.
BlockedUnresolved  The package is blocked by another package.
BlockedAutomaticallyResolved  The package is blocked by another package but the conflict has been resolved.
